title: Greatsword +1
content:
Greatsword +1 Uncommon 3~13 Damage 2d6 +1 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The thick leather straps wrapped around the base of the blade creak under a solid grip. Greatsword Two-Handed 2.7 85

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The thick leather straps wrapped around the base of the blade creak under a solid grip.

Greatsword Two-Handed

Greatsword +1 is one of the Martial Two-Handed Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3
